title: [LFM] Casual to Half serious 5's
body:
We're a group of friends looking for 2 or 3 more people to add to a team.
We find it hard to have a full 5 constantly on, so looking to add a few more people to the mix.

Ideally you are:
18+ (we're all mid 20's)
At least silver (currently a mix of silver to plats)
Capable of multiple roles (prefer a mid & jng if we're looking solely at 'main' roles)
Can laugh at your mistakes... and everyone elses

Add me in game on 'nonchalant' or leave a message here if interested.

replies.body:
IGN: IamAdmin
Main: jungle and support
ELO: Diamond 5 
21 yo

IGN: Fat2FitLoL and Firetroll
Main Roles: Adc and JG respectively
Both mid 20s currently gold V

Looking to play some ranked 5s and learn from a team environment.

Add in game if you are interested. Based in Newcastle NSW

Ayeo 
IGN: Kyle James
18 years old recently finished school and need something to do with the spare time I have. Main support and adc pretty chill where I go and not afraid to call someone a %%%%os when they do something bad happy to do a scrim or something to see if I am worth while

heya 
IGN : deathbadgar
i am 18 years old and currently gol3 but on the rise as i was gold 5 only 2 weeks ago
would be keen to join your team and make some new friends that are serious bout ranked 5;s but dont rage and want to learn from their mistakes
my main roles are jungle.. playing as nidalee.. who i can also play mid or top with rather well 
i also play alot of ADC with just about all ad champs.. and can play mid as ahri or leblanc 
currently working towards getting kallista and some better top laners
